about_the_game:
Traitors in Salem Original Soundtrack - Music by WaveNebula
Includes 10+ songs, in .mp3 and .wav. Tracks will be downloaded to your Traitors in Salem Steam folder.

1. A Town Destroyed
2. Cheery Meeting
3. Civil Chat
4. Frantic Inspection
5. Freedom To Move
6. Meditation
7. Quiet Contemplation
8. Stress
9. Trial By Fire
10. Victory Over Evil

More music will be added as it is added to Traitors in Salem.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 110 MB available space

short_description: Sound Track for Traitors in Salem, includes all music used in the game.
